title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions:
Experience the future of gardening with our Hydroponics Growing System, featuring 12 pods for indoor gardening with an LED Grow Light. This innovative system utilizes SMD LED technology with 25W power to provide a full-spectrum light that is 30% more luminous than traditional lights, accelerating plant growth by 5 times! 

The advanced Deep Flow water circulation system ensures that your plants receive fresh, clean water every 30 minutes with minimal noise. With a 4L water tank capacity, your system can sustain self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. Plus, the height of the system is adjustable up to 17.78 inches, allowing you to accommodate various plant types.

Our package includes everything you need to get started, from the hydroponics system itself to plant food, planting hats, baskets, biochar mud, an adapter, and a manual for easy setup. And with a 360-day warranty period and after-sales service available, you can trust in the quality and support of our product. Elevate your indoor gardening experience with our Hydroponics Growing System today!
